summary: THE CONSUMER NOTICED THAT HIS VEHICLE WAS LEAKING ANTIFREEZE, AND WHEN HE TURNED HIS VEHICLE OFF THERE WAS NO PRESSURE IN THE RADIATOR.  THE CONSUMER TOOK HIS VEHICLE TO THE DEALER AND WAS TOLD THAT THE VEHICLE HAD A LEAKING INTAKE MANIFOLD GASKET.  AFTER TESTING THE VEHICLE THE DEALER INDICATED THAT THE REPAIR WOULD COST  $678.00 PLUS TAX.    *NLM
